name: Hotel Strolz
description:
Sourrounded by meadows and forests in the middle of the Zillertal mountain range. A island of peace to enjoy and yet within walking distance from the centre (300 meters). 
All rooms in our hotel are en-suite with telephone, satelite TV, comfortable furniture and a balcony. Enjoy some sunbathing in our big garden or on the terrace while your children play mini-golf or table tennis or have a swimm in the pool. Little treats complete your happiness!
Enjoy worldly pleasures! Can you imagine anything better than ending the day with a delicious meal. It's our priority to offer you the very best: Home-made wholemeal bread baked from freshly ground biological grain, nouvelle cuisine, dietary food, tyrolean specialities and vegetarian dishes. 
And some vintage wines from our well-assorted wine cellar to go with the dinner. 
Relax in our indoor-swimming pool with the sun terrace or visit the Strolz Sauna World. 
Our Villa Strolz and the Guest house are near to the hotel (60m). In our Villa Strolz the rooms are en-suite with telephone, satellite TV and comfortable furniture. The majority of the rooms has got a balcony. The Guest house is next to our Villa. There we have family appartements. Also double rooms and singlerooms are bookable. All rooms have available telephone, satellite TV, hairdryer and comfortable furniture.
INKLUSIV: 
heating; stream; water; sauna free of charge; pets free of charge; indoor swimming pool free of charge; bicycle rental company free of charge; in winter sledge rental company free of charge; 
EXCLUSIVE: 
Solarium & Hydrojet: 1 coin (10 min 4€); 2 coins (20 min 6€) 
Underground parking place: in summer 3. 50€, in winter 5€ per car and day 
Wireless-Lan: 1/2H 1€; 1H 2€; 2H 3€; 5H 6€; 10H 10€; 1 week 22€,-
Check-in 02p.m. / Check-out 10a.m.
Car: Motorway Inn Valley - direction Zillertal (Slip Road Zillertal) and then 30 kilometers on the “Zillertaler Bundesstraße” Nr. 169 to Mayrhofen
·	Traffic Circle Mayrhofen North - left-hand side
·	Crossover IQ Petrol Station - right-hand side
·	Crossover Banking Institution “Raiffeisenbank” - left-hand side
·	Pass the “Europahaus” - after ca. 200m furcation right-hand side (you can see already our Hotel!)
View:
·	
Train: Railway Station Jenbach - 35 kilometers with the “Zillertalbahn” or the buses to Mayrhofen

makesOffer.description: All rooms in our hotel are furnished very comfortable. They are appointed with telephone, satellite TV, shower or bath/WC, hairdryer, and balcony with a splendid view on the Ziller Valley Mountains. Wireless Internet is also available.

makesOffer.name: Suite
makesOffer.description:
We create a small Kingdom for you. Our "Suite Maria" is appointed with a bedroom for two persons, bathroom with a bath-tube, shower/WC, hairdryer and a dryer for the towels.

In the anteroom of our "Suite Maria" is equipped with a spacious closet, wardrobe and safe.

The amply balcony offers you a splendid view on the Ziller Valley Mountains.
